name: Adept Rider
effects: While mounted you gain Major Evasion, reducing damage from area attacks by 25%. Dismounting spawns a dust cloud at your position for 12 seconds that deals 1436 Physical Damage every 1 second to enemies who stand inside it. You and group members inside the dust cloud gain Major Evasion. Dust cloud can be created once every 12 seconds.

name: Aegis Caller
effects: When you deal critical melee damage, summon a Lesser Aegis for 11 seconds. After 2.5 seconds, the Lesser Aegis spins its blades, dealing 3730 Bleed Damage every 1 second. This effect can occur once every 12 seconds.

name: Aegis of Galenwe
effects: Gain Minor Aegis at all times, reducing your damage taken from Dungeon, Trial, and Arena Monsters by 5%.
After successfully blocking, you grant Empower to 11 allies within 15 meters for 5 seconds, increasing the damage of their next Light Attack by 40%. This effect can occur once every 2 seconds.

name: Affliction
effects: When you deal damage, you deal 1830 Disease Damage to the target. This damage immediately applies the Diseased status effect, applying Minor Defile to the target, reducing their Healing Received and Health Recovery by 15% for 4 seconds. This set can occur once every 4 seconds.

name: Akaviri Dragonguard
effects: Adds 158 Health Recovery, Reduces the cost of your Ultimate abilities by 15%.

name: Alessia's Bulwark
effects: When you take damage from a melee attack, you have a 15% chance to reduce the attacker's Weapon Damage by 300 for 5 seconds.

name: Alessian Order
effects: Increase your Health Recovery by 2% of your sum total Physical Resistance and Spell Resistance. Current Bonus Health Recovery: 0.

name: Almalexia's Mercy
effects: When you take damage, you heal you and your group members within 7 meters of you for 4000 Health over 3 seconds. This effect can occur once every 3 seconds.

name: Amber Plasm
effects: Adds 276 Magicka Recovery, Adds 276 Stamina Recovery, Adds 276 Health Recovery
